name: PongPong Girl
description:
Nice to meet you! During this special time, how is everything going?



Cube Starman suddenly attack, and you've stepped up in order to protect the world!



After a white-hot battle, it's time to relax!
Come and meet the girls who adore you and show them your charm!

Shoot, Smash, Level up, Collect items.

FEATURES


  • Crush all the Cube Starman！
  • Private dates with 4 girls with different personalities!
  • Random levels.
  • Learn to upgrade 16 special abilities so that you can be more flexible in the battle.
  • Unlock collections through responding to the girls' various questions, interact more!
  • Review the unlocked dating scenes in the photo album.
